attributes.action: make google remove Jew Watch from the Google Search Engine
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When performing a search for the word "Jew" on google.. the first result
is a site that has been notorious for being anti-semitic... Google is the # 1 search site and the fact that
The first search result would yield an anti-semetic site is all too
common in a growing era of increased Anti Semetism.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
